The average bot is about 7 or 8 feet. To put things into perspective, 
Killfest is 14, Demise is 15, EndBringer is 16. I think Scorponok on 
the show was about 7 or 8, but he's your char so its your call.

::Killfest::

Killfest raises an eyebrow. "What is this about War?"


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Robert Dahl <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> OOC) out of curiousity how tall would the average robot be?
